title: The next meal….?
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Hanayo-chan, what should we do for our next eat out date?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Hmm, what would be good? The first was gratin right? Then after that Okonomiyaki, Meat Dangos….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>We also ate Karaage right? It was delicious….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It really was! I was a little surprised when you put the Karaage between some bread and poured sauce on it, Emma-san, but they go along surprisingly well, that was the first time I knew that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu. I just remembered that it was popular to pour sauce on your Karaage in my school cafeteria. It goes along with rice too right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah! It was the best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>….I kind of want to eat something with sauce now….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Me too…. Hey, why don’t we ask You-san to make Yokisoba for us?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I want to eat Yokisoba~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Fufu. Then let’s contact her immediately♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
